posts.title: Black Light Glow Party Kit
posts.content: Turn your home into a den of ecstasy, music, and mind blowing visual effects using this black light glow party kit. The kit contains top grade black lights designed to install much easier than traditional bulbs while producing a brighter glow.

posts.title: Baby Pacifier Thermometer
posts.content: Take your newborn baby’s body temperature without humiliating him by sticking a thermometer up his virgin ass – instead simply use the baby pacifier thermometer. This clever device doubles as a calming pacifier as well as a tool to easily get your baby’s temperature.

posts.title: Light Up Shoelaces
posts.content: Infuse any wardrobe with some techno flavor using the light up shoelaces. Whether you’re wearing your most expensive shoes or the oldest pair of sneakers in the closet, these luminous shoe laces will make any shoe shine like new.

posts.title: Spillproof Travel Mug
posts.content: Guarantee your beverage remains inside its container no matter what by storing it inside the spillproof travel mug. This 16 ounce mug employs smart grip technology to make it impervious to accidental bumps, making it ideal to take on boats, picnics, or the beach.

posts.title: Imploding Kittens Expansion Pack
posts.content: If you love explosions, kittens, laser beams, and sometimes goats, then you’re sure to go wild over the Imploding Kittens expansion pack. It includes 20 new illustrated cards that expands the core deck from 5 to 6 players and is compatible with the original deck.

posts.title: Light Up Umbrella
posts.content: Stay dry and lit up with this LED Light Up Umbrella. This umbrella features an LED shaft that lights up with multiple colors. At 36 inches long this light up umbrella is perfect for rainy nights or to put together a Blade Runner style costume.

posts.title: Touchless Toilet Flush Kit
posts.content: Make your bathroom a more hygienic environment for everyone using this touchless toilet flush kit. This battery operated kit works on most standard toilets so you can easily flush afterwards without having to place your dirty hands on it.

posts.title: Dinosaur Table Lamps
posts.content: Light up your bedroom with a little prehistoric flair using these dinosaur table lamps. These cold cast ceramic dinosaur lamps feature a detailed and life-like design and come with a 7-watt bulb that creates a soft inner yellow glow.

posts.title: Butterfly Knife BBQ Fork
posts.content: Ensure your fellow meat eaters keep their hands off your prime cut by pulling out this butterfly knife BBQ fork. Instead of a sharp blade, this compact utensil houses a trusty stainless steel BBQ fork and bottle opener, perfect for all your BBQ related needs.

posts.title: Drone Landing Raft System
posts.content: Give your drone the ability to land on the water by outfitting it with this landing raft system. It takes just one minute to install or remove, and is crafted from ultra-lightweight high impact polymers that are durable and weigh less than 300 grams.

posts.title: LED Cooler Lights
posts.content: Make life easier for your thirsty guests during your next nighttime shindig by making your drinks more noticeable using these LED cooler lights. These battery powered lights are waterproof and come in 6 bight colors – blue, gold, orange, white, red, and green.

posts.title: Popsicle Mold Bags
posts.content: Create delicious, all natural snacks from the comfort of home with the Popsicle mold bags. These specially designed bags are manufactured with a durable bottom seal to prevent leakage – allowing you to turn your favorite ingredients into frozen snacks.
